message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm really interested in the product, but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  Would you be open to $105?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $110 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $108.
